GeneDef.label: cyclically self-learning
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that cyclically improve the carriers' skills by creating complex simulations in their minds of possible situations in which they could be used.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every 2 days increases the <color=#8a8ae6>experience</color> of one random <color=#8a8ae6>skill</color> by 60%.
Skills related to <color=#8a8ae6>passion</color> have a higher priority regardless of <color=#8a8ae6>aptitudes</color>.
